variable.name: Protocol
variable.description: Children's Oncology Group P9904 and P9905 protocols. See Ramsey LB, et. Al. Blool 121(6):898-904, 2013 (PMID:23233662) for details.

variable.name: Treatment arm
variable.description: Treatment arms in COG P9904/P9905 protocols.

variable.name: infusion
variable.description: Methotrexate 4-hour infusion of a 2g/m2 dose or 24 hour infusion of a 1g/m2 dose

variable.name: average methotrexate clearance
variable.description: Methotrexate clearance averaged over multiple courses for each patient

variable.name: Adjusted methotrexate clearance
variable.description: Methotrexate clearance adjusted for protocol, treatment arm, infusion, gender, genetically determined race; mean clearance among patient population was normalized to zero.

variable.name: genetically determined Race
variable.description: Race genetcially determined using STRUCTURE with genome-wide mapping array
